# DockerShimSettings.RandomMaximumRuntimeRelativeDelta property

The amount of random fluction in [`MaximumRuntime`](MaximumRuntime.md). E.g., `0.10` is a 10% change; if [`MaximumRuntime`](MaximumRuntime.md) is 30 minutes, then the actual maximum runtime would be a random value between 27 and 33 minutes. Defaults to 0.10 (10%).

```csharp
public double RandomMaximumRuntimeRelativeDelta { get; set; }
```
